outputs.output_descr:
The Project aims to improve Solid Waste Management Services of four Joint Councils Services for Planning and development (JCspd), including Jericho & the Jordan River Rift Valley, Bethlehem, Salfeet and Tulkarem. 

The main project activity is to procure Solid Waste Management Equipment including, collection, transfer and land filling. Therefore the project will improve the overall management and services delivered to the 491,168 residents of these Governorates and improve their living standards.

project_descr: improvement of solid waste management services through upgrading solid waste collection fleet of the joint service councils in West Bank
project_title: Improvement of Solid waste Management In the oPt
